price: [¡Oh, Mujámmad!] Te he revelado el Corán gradualmente [en respuesta a distintas situaciones].
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ تَنزِيلٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nazzalnā ʿalayka al-qur'āna tanzīlan
